forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As the night drifts onward in Downtown San Francisco, a tranquil air blankets the city, marked by the gentle embrace of scattered clouds. The temperature has settled around a mild 56 degrees, creating a comfortable atmosphere ideal for a leisurely evening stroll. The wisps of the west-southwest breeze, whispering at about eight miles per hour, encourage adventure, while the soft glow of city lights shimmers against the dim backdrop, rendering the iconic skyline a peaceful sight.

Looking ahead to Thursday, dawn promises a refreshing reprieve with sunny skies that will warm the day to a pleasant high near 66. As the afternoon unfolds, temperatures may soften to around 64, complemented by a light wind that will keep the air lively yet soothing. The forecast doesn't hint at any significant fog, which should remain a distant memory as the sunlight breaks through. Dressing in layers is advisable; a light jacket in the morning gives way to comfortable attire for the balmy afternoon, offering the perfect ensemble for a day filled with exploration. Given the inviting conditions, one might consider visiting a local café for a morning coffee, followed by a leisurely walk along the Waterfront—where the subtle sounds of the waves mingle with the rustle of the streets—before hitting the trails of Golden Gate Park for a breath of fresh air amidst the urban bustle.
